definition: to repair/to patch/to mend/to make up for/to fill (a vacancy)/to supplement
to/for/for the benefit of/to give/to allow/to do sth (for sb)/(grammatical equivalent of 被)/(grammatical equivalent of 把)/(sentence intensifier)

sentences.english: The first commercially contracted re-supply mission to the International Space Station (ISS) has begun.
sentences.chinese: 對國際空間站的首個商業化補給任務已經開始實行。

sentences.english: O groundwater recharges the mine through buried outcrop of bedrock laterally.
sentences.chinese: 奧灰水通過基岩隱伏露頭側向補給礦井。

sentences.english: While serving as a supply tug operator on Fondor, Shire also was a thief.
sentences.chinese: 希雷既是方多的補給拖船操作員，也是一個偷船賊。

sentences.english: The unsaturated irrigation supply has duality in yellow soil.
sentences.chinese: 集中的灌溉補給，在黃土層中形成二元非飽和滲流。

sentences.english: You need to be refreshed by outside influences.
sentences.chinese: 你需要外界影響的補給。

sentences.english: Support players will deplete ammunition quickly, and will need the rifleman class to resupply them.
sentences.chinese: 支援兵的彈藥消耗很快，需要突擊兵來補給他們。

sentences.english: The commander decide to make an airstrike on the enemy's supply line.
sentences.chinese: 指揮官決定空襲敵人的補給線。

sentences.english: It also includes day to day complaints about lack of equipment and supplies.
sentences.chinese: 它同時包括日復一日對缺少裝備以及補給的抱怨。

sentences.english: Ammunition is used for resupplying units.
sentences.chinese: 彈藥被用來補給作戰單位。
太平洋艦隊得到了食物補給。

sentences.english: Supplies are also being dropped by air.
sentences.chinese: 飛機也正在空投補給物資。

sentences.english: Because supply so tired during the day, we all slept 3 people dead of dead weight.
sentences.chinese: 由於白天補給太勞累，我們3個人都睡得死沉實驗沉。

sentences.english: The besieged army could not easily revictual.
sentences.chinese: 被包圍的部隊不容易再獲得糧食的補給。

sentences.english: Then the gold seekers had to move their supplies up the mountain.
sentences.chinese: 隨後，這些淘金者還必須將他們的補給運過大山。

sentences.english: Here is the SMS Vulkan, sub tender for the North Sea U-boat fleet.
sentences.chinese: 這是一艘“維路卡”號補給艦，爲北海U艇部隊所有。

sentences.english: Progress since the resupply has been better than at first.
sentences.chinese: 在補給後，進展比開始要好。

definition: to bring up to full strength/to make up a deficiency/to fill (a vacancy, gap etc)
to pull up (stop one's vehicle)/to park/(of a machine) to stop working/to stall
to purchase/to buy/to do one's shopping/purchasing agent/buyer
to furnish/to provide/supply (as in supply and demand)
